item.title: 英国城市大臣图利普-西迪克（Tulip Siddiq）在道德审查后辞职
item.description: 英国市政大臣图利普-西迪克（Tulip Siddiq）因被指控使用和收受与被推翻的孟加拉国政权有关的财产而接受道德审查，随后辞去了政府职务。【原文：The UK’s City minister Tulip Siddiq resigned from the government following an ethics review into allegations around her use and receipt of properties linked to the ousted Bangladeshi regime.】

item.title: Zetwerk 为 5 亿美元印度首次公开募股选择银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度制造和物流公司 Zetwerk Pvt 已为可能在孟买进行的首次公开募股挑选了银行，这次募股可能至少筹集 5 亿美元。【原文：Indian manufacturing and logistics firm Zetwerk Pvt has picked banks for a potential Mumbai initial public offering that could raise at least $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 西班牙的购房 100% 税收计划可能难以在议会获得通过
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）提议对部分外国人的购房行为征收 100%的税款，但由于该国议会存在分歧，这一提议远不能确定能否生效。【原文：Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez’s proposal to slap a 100% tax on some foreigners’ house purchases is far from certain to take effect given the divisiveness of the country’s parliament.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，Meta 计划裁减 5% 业绩最差的员工
item.description: 根据一份发给员工的内部备忘录，Meta Platforms 公司正计划裁减约 5%表现最差的员工，并打算在今年重新填补他们的职位。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is planning to cut about 5% of its lowest performers with the intent of backfilling their roles this year, according to an internal memo sent to employees.】

item.title: 斯塔默不会卷入西班牙 100% 房屋税计划的争论中
item.description: 唐宁街坚称首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）与西班牙首相有着 "良好的关系"，此前佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）威胁要对欧盟以外买家的房屋销售征收100%的税。【原文：Downing Street insisted Prime Minister Keir Starmer has a “great relationship” with his Spanish counterpart, after Pedro Sanchez threatened to impose a 100% tax on sales of homes to buyers from outside the European Union.】

item.title: MSNBC 总裁拉希达-琼斯在分拆之前下台
item.description: MSNBC 总裁拉希达-琼斯（Rashida Jones）在执掌这家进步政治新闻网四年后于周二卸任，因为母公司康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp.【原文：MSNBC President Rashida Jones stepped down Tuesday after four years running the progressive political news network, as parent company Comcast Corp. prepares to spin off several of its cable-TV assets.】

item.title: 面临制裁风险，俄罗斯石油买家转向欧佩克+巨头
item.description: 官员们说，俄罗斯在亚洲的石油客户正在与该国在中东的欧佩克+石油输出国组织（OPEC+）同行接洽，以防美国的最新制裁造成供应缺口。【原文：Russia’s oil customers in Asia are approaching the country’s OPEC+ counterparts in the Middle East in case the latest US sanctions create a supply gap, officials said.】

item.title: 南非将工资待遇提高至 5%，工资协议前景更加乐观
item.description: 在政府将薪资提议从 4.7% 提高到 5%之后，南非公共部门工人对与政府达成薪资协议表示乐观。【原文：South African public sector workers voiced optimism of reaching a pay deal with the government after it improved the offer to 5% from 4.7%.】

item.title: 林德特（Lindt）销售强劲预示需求回升，可可价格上涨
item.description: 巧克力生产商Lindt & Spruengli AG公司公布了强劲的销售增长，表明尽管价格创下新高，但需求仍有弹性，可可期货随之上涨。【原文：Cocoa futures gained after chocolate maker Lindt & Spruengli AG reported strong sales’ growth, indicating that demand remained resilient despite record prices.】

item.title: 乌克兰债务主管布特萨就特朗普交易警告债券持有人
item.description: 乌克兰债务管理负责人告诫投资者，不要因唐纳德-特朗普下周重返白宫而寄希望于与俄罗斯的冲突能得到迅速而妥善的解决。【原文：Ukraine’s debt-management chief cautioned investors against betting on a quick and tidy resolution to the conflict with Russia based on Donald Trump’s return to the White House next week.】

item.title: 阿布扎比马斯达尔公司寻求美国收购以实现绿色电力目标
item.description: 阿布扎比主要的可再生能源公司在一年前收购了 Terra-Gen Power Holdings II LLC 50%的股份后，正寻求扩大其在美国的业务。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s main renewables energy company is looking to expand its business in the US after taking a 50% stake in Terra-Gen Power Holdings II LLC a year ago.】

item.title: 碧桂园因中国房地产市场下滑再创亏损纪录
item.description: 作为中国最大的开发商之一，碧桂园控股有限公司在拖欠债务后继续漫长的重组过程，2023 年再次创下亏损纪录。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co. suffered another record loss in 2023 as one of China’s largest developers continues its lengthy restructuring process after defaulting on its debt.】

item.title: 阿布扎比风险投资公司投资加密技术初创企业 Dfns
item.description: 随着数字资产交易的升温，阿布扎比主权财富基金ADQ支持的风险投资公司Further Ventures牵头向总部位于巴黎的加密钱包技术公司Dfns投资了1600万美元。【原文：Further Ventures, the venture capital firm backed by Abu Dhabi’s sovereign wealth fund ADQ, led a $16 million investment in Paris-based crypto wallet technology firm Dfns, as digital-asset dealmaking heats up.】

item.title: 钱柜 777 的贷款人试图阻止出售意大利历史最悠久的足球俱乐部
item.description: Advantage Capital Holdings LLC 发起法律挑战，试图阻止热那亚板球&足球俱乐部的资本结构调整，使一名罗马尼亚投资者成为意大利历史最悠久的足球俱乐部的大股东。【原文：Advantage Capital Holdings LLC started a legal challenge in a bid to block the recapitalization of Genoa Cricket & Football Club, which made a Romanian investor the majority shareholder of Italy’s oldest football club.】

item.title: 雷切尔-里夫斯称英国将 "始终 "遵守财政规则
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，英国将 "在任何时候 "都遵守其财政规则，因为在最近借贷成本飙升之后，她面临着解释如何稳定英国公共财政的持续压力。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves said the UK will meet its fiscal rules “at all times,” as she faced ongoing pressure to explain how she’ll stabilize Britain’s public finances following a recent spike in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 食品价格下降，美国批发通胀意外缓解
item.description: 受食品成本下降和服务价格持平的帮助，美国批发通胀在 12 月份意外降温，这可能有助于缓解对价格压力持续存在的担忧。【原文：US wholesale inflation unexpectedly cooled in December, helped by a drop in food costs and and flat services prices that may help temper concerns of lingering price pressures.】

item.title: 德国大选热门人选因绿色钢铁疑虑引发反弹
item.description: 德国保守派领跑者弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）对钢铁行业的绿色转型表示怀疑，引发了下月大选前的激烈辩论。【原文：Germany’s conservative front-runner Friedrich Merz cast doubt on the steel industry’s green transition, sparking a fierce debate before snap elections next month.】

item.title: 特朗普将于下周在达沃斯向各国领导人发表虚拟演讲
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普在就任美国总统仅几天后，就将出席下周在达沃斯举行的世界经济论坛。【原文：Donald Trump will virtually attend the World Economic Forum in Davos next week, just days after his inauguration as US president.】

item.title: 捷克投资集团 J&T 计划 2025 年出售 3 亿欧元债券
item.description: 总部位于捷克的 J&T 金融集团计划最早在第二季度出售 3 亿欧元（约合 3.08 亿美元）的债券，为可能赎回之前的票据预先融资，并为其业务扩张提供资金。【原文：Czech-based J&T Finance Group is targeting a €300 million ($308 million) bond sale as early as the second quarter to pre-finance a potential redemption of an earlier note and fund its business expansion.】

item.title: 德国商业银行正在洽谈租用新的 52 层法兰克福办公大楼
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）正在洽谈租用一座 52 层的摩天大楼，该摩天大楼目前正由地区贷款机构 Helaba 在法兰克福建造。【原文：German lender Commerzbank AG is in talks to rent a 52-story skyscraper currently being built in Frankfurt by regional lender Helaba.】

item.title: 莱茵金属首席执行官称特朗普对欧洲军方施压是好事
item.description: 莱茵金属股份公司首席执行官阿明-帕佩尔格（Armin Papperger）表示，欧洲国防工业必须进行整合，以满足未来几年的生产需求，因为欧洲大陆面临着俄罗斯的侵略和美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）要求欧洲加强军事力量的压力。【原文：Europe’s defense industry must consolidate to meet production needs in the coming years as the continent faces Russian aggression and increasing pressure from US President-elect Donald Trump to ramp up its military, Rheinmetall AG CEO Armin Papperger said.】

item.description: 印度采用了一些世界上最新的数字技术，以解决世界上最大的人类聚会中一个最古老的问题。【原文：India has deployed some of the world’s newest digital technologies to solve one of the oldest problems at the world’s largest human gathering.】

item.title: 阿拉弗拉稀土公司从澳大利亚获得 2 亿澳元融资
item.description: 阿拉弗拉稀土有限公司（Arafura Rare Earths Ltd.）将从澳大利亚国家重建基金（National Reconstruction Fund）获得 2 亿澳元（1.24 亿美元），用于支持一个新矿山和加工设施的建设。【原文：Arafura Rare Earths Ltd. will get A$200 million ($124 million) from Australia’s National Reconstruction Fund to support a new mine and processing facility, the latest move by Western nations to boost supply chains of critical resources amid a strategic contest with China.】

item.title: 阿波罗与斯坦查特签署 30 亿美元能源转型合作协议

item.title: 英国石油公司首席执行官奥金克斯面临关键考验，推迟更新战略
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）首席执行官默里-奥金克斯（Murray Auchincloss）下个月将面临一个关键时刻，届时他将向投资者发布一项被推迟的新战略。【原文：BP Plc’s Chief Executive Officer Murray Auchincloss faces a critical moment next month when he makes the delayed presentation of a new strategy to investors.】

item.title: 交易员认为南非将在 2025 年降息一次
item.description: 交易员们缩减了对南非今年降息的押注，市场目前只对一次降息进行定价，因为他们要解读美联储放缓降息的倾向和美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在关税问题上的立场。【原文：Traders scaled back their bets for South Africa’s interest rate cuts this year, with markets now pricing in only one as they decipher the Federal Reserve’s preference to move slower on rates and US president-elect Donald Trump’s path on tariffs.】
